title: Doner
instructions: Season the planted generously with döner spice mix (cumin, paprika, coriander, garlic powder, oregano, salt, and pepper).
Heat olive oil in a pan over high heat. Sauté the planted for 5-6 minutes until crispy and slightly charred at the edges.
Warm pita bread or flatbread in a dry pan or oven until soft and pliable.
Prepare toppings: shred lettuce and red cabbage, slice tomatoes and onions, and make garlic-yogurt sauce.
Open the pita and layer with the hot planted, fresh vegetables, and pickled peppers.
Drizzle with garlic sauce and optional hot sauce, wrap tightly, and serve immediately.
